text:
(bouncy music begins)
- [Narrator] AWS Marketplace

makes it easy to find,
try, buy, and deploy

Software as a Service, also
known as SaaS solutions.
To make this even easier for you,

we are announcing a new
AWS Marketplace feature.
AWS Marketplace now offers customers

SaaS contract-free trials to
perform software evaluations,

to help determine whether
it's a fit before they buy.

With access to free trials
from leading SaaS vendors,
you can easily start software evaluations
on AWS Marketplace,
simplifying the procurement process.

Buyers can try the software
before they buy it,

making the procurement
process smoother and easier.

Buyers can rest assured
that each trial is free,
giving you peace of mind
in your evaluation process before you buy.
Free trials can be essential
to many customers' purchase process.

In fact, 40% of AWS
Marketplace customers look

for products with free
trials before they buy them.
Furthermore, nine out of 10 customers
consider free trials to be important

and a quarter of those
consider them critical
to the procurement process.

Sellers who have already
listed SaaS products

on AWS Marketplace can
create a free trial offer
in just a few clicks.
AWS Marketplace sellers with free trials
are seeing an increase in conversion rate.
The SaaS free trial feature gives sellers

control of trial parameters,
reporting, and analytics.
Here's what sellers have to say
about the AWS SaaS free trial feature.
(upbeat music)
Get started with SaaS free trials.
(upbeat music fades)
